verbose_text: The NAFLD model mice, induced by a high-fat diet (HFD), was successfully established, and mouse hepatocytes were isolated to characterize the effects of QKI 5 mediated by SIRT1 on the synthesis of triglycerides in the liver and the activation of the peroxisome proliferator activated receptor (PPAR) alpha, Forkhead box protein O1 (FoxO1) signaling pathway.
evidence: mediated by SIRT1 on the synthesis of triglycerides in the liver and the activation of the peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor
